title: Radio City Music Hall: Carpet Design: Still Life with Violins and Wine Glasses
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream illustration board, lined
description: Pattern in browns, terra cotta, and navy blue of violins and wine glasses in diagonal rows so that one row of violins (their necks facing away from each other) interchages with alternating wine glass, violin, wine glass, violin.
name: Drawing
